mapper.sql: user_id, user_name, password, phone_num, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, is_delete, version
mapper.select: SELECT muser.user_id, muser.user_name, muser.password, muser.phone_num, CONCAT_WS(':',dictType.dict_type_desc,uattr.attr_id) AS attr_id, CONCAT_WS(':',dict.dict_name,uattr.attr_value) AS attr_value FROM m_user_info muser LEFT JOIN t_user_attr uattr ON muser.user_id = uattr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_data dict ON uattr.attr_value = dict.dict_value AND uattr.attr_id = dict.dict_type LEFT JOIN t_dict_type dictType ON uattr.attr_id = dictType.dict_type WHERE muser.is_delete = 0 AND uattr.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_enable = 0 AND dictType.is_delete = 0 AND dictType.is_enable = 0 AND muser.user_name = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY muser.user_id, uattr.attr_id
